main.header: Whole school life in one place!
main.text: The best school application for students to meet other people, communication and to care about themselves!

introduction.text-1: Do you have a problem, but you don't know how to resolve it? Just make an appointment with psychological, you need only one click!
introduction.text-2: Need to borrow something or want to write anonymous message, which will everyone see? We've created for you spotted & school notice board. PS, teachers don't see it!
introduction.text-3: With our application, you can meet new people from your school with similar interests!

socials.facebook: On our facebook page, you will see us & our progress! You will find there entries about productivity, science and more! Check it out now!
socials.instagram: Instagram is the foundation of our community. Three times a week you can find there entries about school and productivity.
socials.tiktok: On our tiktok account, you will find fast tips about science and school. Click and check it now!
socials.medium: Are you ambitious? Do you want to be successful? We introduce you our blog where we explore school topics deeper.

ebook.header: Receive a free e-book about 10 methods of effective learning!
ebook.text: Newsletter has been created for ambitious people. Thanks to it, you will receive an e-book about 10 pieces of information and gain that will help you shape yourself professionally.
